mapper.select: SELECT U.IDX, U.ID, U.EMAIL, U.PASSWORD, U.NICKNAME, ST.NAME AS 'SHELTER_TYPE', S.SHELTER_NAME, S.SHELTER_TEL, S.SHELTER_PERSON_NAME, S.SHELTER_ZIP_CODE, S.SHELTER_ADDRESS, S.SHELTER_ADDRESS_DETAIL, S.SHELTER_EMAIL, S.SHELTER_BUSINESS_NUMBER, U.STATUS, U.CREATED_AT FROM USERS U JOIN SHELTERS S ON U.IDX = S.USER_IDX JOIN SHELTER_TYPES ST ON S.SHELTER_TYPE_IDX = ST.IDX WHERE U.STATUS = 0 AND U.USER_TYPE_IDX = 2 ORDER BY IDX DESC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{cp}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS U JOIN SHELTERS S ON U.IDX = S.USER_IDX JOIN SHELTER_TYPES ST ON S.SHELTER_TYPE_IDX = ST.IDX WHERE U.STATUS = 0 AND U.USER_TYPE_IDX = 2

SELECT U.IDX, U.ID, U.EMAIL, U.PASSWORD, U.NICKNAME, ST.NAME AS 'SHELTER_TYPE', S.SHELTER_NAME, S.SHELTER_TEL, S.SHELTER_PERSON_NAME, S.SHELTER_ZIP_CODE, S.SHELTER_ADDRESS, S.SHELTER_ADDRESS_DETAIL, S.SHELTER_EMAIL, S.SHELTER_BUSINESS_NUMBER, U.STATUS, U.CREATED_AT FROM USERS U JOIN SHELTERS S ON U.IDX = S.USER_IDX JOIN SHELTER_TYPES ST ON S.SHELTER_TYPE_IDX = ST.IDX WHERE U.USER_TYPE_IDX = 2 AND U.IDX = #{idx}
